title: Bug 6794ProgressMonitorPart.setTaskName should update text label as ProgressMonitorDialog does
OB: The ProgressMonitorDialog updates the task label if the method setTaskName iscalled. ProgressMonitorPart doesn't do so. As a consequence progress reportinglooks different if an operation in executed in a wizard or using a progressmonitor dialog.
EB: Bug 6794ProgressMonitorPart.setTaskName should update text label as ProgressMonitorDialog does I think, they should behave the same.
